headline.main: Doctors Assert Cheney Leads Vigorous Life, Despite Ills

docs.abstract: Dick Cheney's doctors say Gov George W Bush's designated running mate is in excellent health and takes many drugs for heart disease and other medical conditions (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: Dick Cheney, Gov. George W. Bush's newly announced running mate, is in excellent health and takes many drugs for heart disease and other medical conditions, his doctors said yesterday. ''He is up to the task of the most sensitive public office,'' Mr. Cheney's personal physician, Dr. Gary Malakoff, said in a letter dated July 22 and released by the Bush campaign yesterday.
